  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 / GTX 680 (Vulkan support required.)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 / GTX 680 (Vulkan support required.)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
